description: Absolute waste of time, should be removed from the repos entirely as this will not work and is clearly not being maintained. Tried everything to get this to communicate with MySQL and MariaDB with no joy.
After Install, Get MySQL errors and will NOT RUN in Ub untu 20.10.. DO not install if running Ubuntu Newer Than 17 or 18 due to MySQL incompatibility in Newer Versions of Ubuntu

Very good programm on 18.04, unfortunately I couldn't make it working on a fresh install of Ubuntu Focal Fossa 20.04, because of a weird MySQL / MariadB problem.
There are some forum threads available that describe the problem and possible somultions, but so far non of them solved the issue.
summary: Unfortunately doesn't run easily on Ubuntu 20.04

description: CQRLOG version 2.5.2 has been released; major bug fixes. When can we expect it to show up in Fedora distribution?
Getting the MySQL error on startup with Ubuntu 22.04. Moving on.
The best Amateur Radio Logging Software for Linux that i know. Can be intimidating at times though.

Si vienes del Ham Radio Deluxe encontrarás mínimas diferencias y un montón de utilidades como programa de log. Entre ellas el poder transmitir en CW sin necesidad de usar un programa externo o en el caso del FT8, el poder saber si una estación la has trabajado ya con anterioridad, si es un país que te interesa para el DXCC y muchísimas más cosas.
summary: El mejor log que puedas encontrar

description: me parece que cqrlog ha logrado crear un programa lo suficientemente potente como para tener todo lo que necesites en un solo lugar. ademas de manera bonita y intuitiva
summary: El mejor programa de libro de guardia para radioaficionados en linux

description: The best logger for Amateur Radio. I use CQRLog since 2011.
summary: The best logger for Amateur Radio

description: Most powerful amateur radio log for linux.
summary: Most powerful hamradio log for linux
